programme.title: AFRO NINJA
programme.desc: Reggie Carson has been working at the post office for over a decade. He hasnt been promoted, his boss picks on him and he doesnt have a girlfriend. All of this changes when Reggie and his post-office colleague, Sandra, find a thirty year old package on Halloween with magic nunchuks. The next day Reggie wakes up and finds he has a bad fro, badder abs and the baddest ninja skills around. He immediately uses these for the cause of justice and prepares for a showdown against the evil Kung Fu Master, Jerome Black Lightning, as Afro Ninja sets out on a quest that will teach him both humility and humbleness, as well as the history of his skills and the truth about his father. Only then can Afro Ninja be the baddest dude in town.

programme.title: ARCHON DEFENDER
programme.desc: Archon Defender follows the path of a young woman, Colette, as she seeks her way through adversity to redemption, as the world she once knew is torn apart by war and tyranny.

programme.title: THIRTY PROOF COIL
programme.desc: A young woman is kidnapped by a mysterious stranger and chained in an eerie, dilapidated barn. Unwilling to play the victim, she plots a daring escape. With thirst and hunger bearing down, her grip on reality loosens. Can she free herself from the chain and the haunting visions? Why is she here? Is that strange presence outside the barn her imagination or the reason for her capture? Thirty Proof Coil, despite its modest budget, leverages brilliant acting, a dramatic location and unabashed enthusiasm to punch viewers right in the nose

programme.title: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards 2016
programme.desc: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards is an annual awards ceremony for people in the Tamil film industry. It is presented by the Tamil language weekly magazine Ananda Vikatan. The awards were introduced in the year 2008, honouring the films that were released in 2007.

programme.title: Rocking performance by Lawrence and Elvin
programme.desc: Master Raghava Lawrence and his brother Elvin, rock the dance floor with enormous energy at Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards 2016, held at Chennai trade center on 13 Jan 2017!

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 43
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. programme.title: The Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: Old couple without a child bakes a gingerbread kid GoGo. GoGo escapes the oven, and runs away from the animals who try to eat him.

programme.title: The Jokester
programme.desc: Zaps silly pranks on his friends go too far and he finds himself all alone to fight Sneevil. A hilarious dance off between Zap and Biggs will determine who will get control of the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: COMMANDO KAPPA
programme.desc: Chai Raja cycles in with a fresh batch of bananas when heavy army boots crunch in stomping at the door of the hotel. Chai Raja looks up and is not one jot happy to see his bossy estranged uncle Commando Kappa. Commando Kappa is a bossy man who wants to take over the hotel from Chai Raja and is zany enough to try any underhanded trick . Sundar senses this animosity and wants Kappa out of the shop but 6 and a half foot , Arnold like built Commando Kappa is a tough man to cross. Because he is no great cook, Kappa uses his army tactics to sabotage and tries messing up Chai Rajas ingredients- he switches the ingredients for the tea, Chai Raja knives suddenly go missing etc- Chai Raja however is quick at adapting and when knives go missing he merely uses his moustache to chop the bananas! Sunder too does his best to foil Kappa. and save Chai Raja- like when Kappa accidentally spills oil intending to slip up Chai Raja, Sundar rather himself skid in and break his own bones just so Chai Raja doesnt step into the oil or guzzle up all the chilli-spiced tea (thanks to Kappa dropping chilli powder into the brew on the sly) before Chai Raja serves it to customers and loses his reputation. However the curious Basha keeps poking his naughty nose in and its difficult for Sundar to keep up with Kappas ploys. Kappa tries to finally seize up the flexible Chai Raja, by offering a tampered herbal oil to limber him up (the oil actually stiffens whatever it is poured on- can demonstrate the effect when Kappa does a test on a small sapling on the sill). But just then Sundar and Basha tumble in as part of their chase and the oil flies landing on Kappa gets all seized up and stiff. The cricked Kappa gives up and is shown the door and Basha gives him a 21- banana peel sendoff. But Sundar has no time to rejoice for Basha is again sneaking up to the fries and must be stopped.

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: BITTEN BY BUG
programme.desc: Buzz falls head over heels for a mysterious, secret admirer who just moved into the library. Suspicious of her true motives, Googly and Iris try to warn Buzz that he knows nothing about his new friend and that she may not be as nice as she seems, but he ignores their advice. After agreeing to meet his new friend for lunch, Buzz learns the hard way that love can really hurt - literally. Watch the brand new, full episode here and find out how Buzz got a boo boo, and why he needed an emergency ride in an ambulance to see the doctor, in another exciting adventure of Creepy Candy

programme.title: MOUSE TRAP
programme.desc: Business is a bit slow at the tea shop and Chai Raja tries churning up new inventive snacks to entice in the customers. The overworked Sundar can only salivate at the sight of the overflowing platters of food and zealously guards them from Basha. It takes all of Sundars self-control not to sample even a fallen fritter/vada. Chai Raja meanwhile opens his larder to take some more flour when much to his shock, he sees a small tail flick out of sight. Mice!! Chai Raja immediately sets Sundar the task of getting rid of them. Sundar after some paw-snapped agony manages to rig a mousetrap and sets it to catch the scurrying culprit. He waits all night and finally dozes off when he is awakened by the snap of the trap. Sundar victoriously marches only to find in the trap, a baby mouse in a diaper. The little tyke of a rodent wails so piteously that Sundar, after some stern admonishing, ushers out of the shop and signals that he should not return. Next morning , business is brisk and Sundar rushes about to wait on customers when he hears a shriek. The lady customer points and much to his shock Sundar sees the diaper-mouse scurry with fritters. Sundar gets an earful from Chai Raja for not completing his task. The wily Basha meanwhile ferrets out the baby mouse and surprises it as it steals the next time- but Basha too is charmed by the baby mouse and ends up showing it his secret stash of fritters. The baby mouse acts as in complete awe of Basha and wants to be his crony.Basha is thrilled and starts tutoring the baby mouse in the art of stealing fritters. The baby mouse goes one step further and uses his big baby eyes each time Sundar catches him- one long wide-eyed pleading look and Sundars heart melts. Both Sundar and Basha think that they will be the mentor to the baby mouse who however is quite a prankster.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: Tarot Tales
programme.desc: A fake yogi loses his forecasting parrot and is in search for a replacement. As he passes by GrandPA’s house he sees Keet and wants him as his fortune telling parrot.

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: New Point of View - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: CHAI-LLENGE
programme.desc: What seems like a normal day turns quite nasty for Chai Raja as he finds an elaborately dressed Japanese) at the steps of his tea shop. He also has a sumo as his assistant. The benign looking Japanese asks for a tea challenge which Chai Raja proudly take up. After all, who can beat Chai Raja?!But the Japanese proves to have some tricks up his sleeve and Chai Rajas reputation may be in danger. The Japanese man shows some stunning tea making skills. Throw into this stressed situation, the impish Basha who finds out that all the commotion just makes it easier for him to lay hands on his favourite banana fries. Chai Raja manages to match the Japanese brew for brew- even the green tea, which Chai Raja matches with his own tulsi and elaichi brew. He even somersaults, skips and even makes tea blindfolded. And he has Sundar as his assistant. The sumo assistant is totally floored by Chai Rajas performance and he applauds, only to get whacked by his boss. But then the irked Japanese presents a tea with the colours of the rainbow. It seems as if Chai Raja is ousted when, Basha chooses the moment to annoy Sundar and the two chase. They accidentally knock over the Japanese mans trunk and out fall not ingredients but readymade teabags...the Japanese man has been cheating while Chai Raja had made his brews from scratch. The Japanese man and his assistant are sent packing minus his dignity while for once Sundar and Basha sit side by side, wolfing down banana fritters served to them as reward by a beaming Chai Raja.

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: A4 Paper
programme.desc: Blank paper? No problem, Hepi and Briko are full of ideas

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: Ghost Mansion
programme.desc: Keet and Cat’s chase ends up in a haunted house…with a crazy ghost living in it. The ghost loves Keet and wants to have her as a pet for himself.

programme.title: Tiggy’s Big Feast
programme.desc: Tiggy is all flustered and confused as he’s not prepared, nor has any idea what to make for a surprise lunch he promised Mayor De Pfeffel. Seems Deedee’s magic is the only answer. The spell she conjures makes Tiggy be totally decided on the recipe that he sees first. And when the spell is cast, the recipe book opens up exactly at the recipe of a pie made of Tika Pila flowers. The problem is that only the Doobydoos can pick the Tika Pila flowers as it grows in the most prickly cacti in Abra-Dabra! But no matter how much Deedee and Nino coax Tiggy to work on another recipe; Tiggy is totally fixated on the Tika Pila flower pie. Though the Doobydoos love eating the flowers, they are too scared of the loud and angry Tika Pila monster that guards them and rush off in a hurry. They finally hit a bargain with Tiggy in exchange for a hundred custard sandwiches. Only with much reassuring and coaxing they pick every Tika Pila flower around. Mayor De Pfeffel is already at Tiggy’s and really hungry. But one Doobydoo is too ambitious and stays back to pick the last Tika Pila flower, but that awakes the Tika Pila monster and he shouts the biggest shout ever, scaring Tiggy and making the pie fly up high and splatter down on his face! The inevitable terrible has happened and there is nothing to give the Mayor. Just then when things couldn’t get any worse Mayor De Pfeffel lunges inside and is happy to see a whole plate of his favourite custard sandwiches.

programme.title: Balloonastics
programme.desc: When Pancake becomes bored with a household chore, he gives up in frustration. Later in the Zooniverse, he’s delighted to help the fallen North Star return to the night sky, but first he has to learn to value the smaller task he has been given, and how it can add to the whole. Be open minded and optimistic, and you’ll be able to take pride in any job!

programme.title: Pancake Icorn
programme.desc: When Pancake is having a particularly bad day, he imagines a better life – then becomes a Zoonicorn!, Appreciating the normal yet wonderful and special things in life that happen every day.

programme.title: BOLT-ADE
programme.desc: Peelville is plagued by a lightning-charged beverage that is the latest weapon in the arsenal of an intergalactic megalomaniac.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: A Lucky Accident
programme.desc: Maple accidentally breaks Pancake’s favorite toy, and he blows up at her. Pancake gains a different perspective about his reaction when, in the Zooniverse, he accidentally breaks a gigantic weather making machine, creating an assortment of weird weather conditions that threaten the Zooniverse. Be slow to lay blame when accidents happen; and resilient in solving the problems when they do.

programme.title: “Cuppa” Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: Newspaper
programme.desc: The best news is that Hepi and Briko have figured out some exciting DIYs!

programme.title: Bear essentials
programme.desc: The twins help a young owl who misses her best friend bear.

programme.title: Tin Can
programme.desc: Tin Tin Tin, Hepi and Briko have an unbelievable idea for these tin cans

programme.title: BIG BUNNY
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to prepare a big feast. Pai sees this as his chance to impress the Elders and earn a new weapon to replace his Mystic Stick. But when he goes to collect the rare striped carrot (a crucial ingredient for his dish), he’s attacked by a Giant Bunny Mutant sent by Negu. His Mystic Stick helps him defeat the Mutant, so he’s content with his weapon…for now.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Polka dots
programme.desc: YoHe wants to be like YoShe. Together with his sister he jumps into a world in which everyone and everything is a copy of a copy and he learns how much important it is to be different

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: Yes Gummy
programme.desc: Feeling a little ‘blah’, Gummy decides to say ‘yes’ to everything that crosses his path. Comic disaster, naturally, soon follows...

programme.title: I Want To Be An Energetic Model
programme.desc: The friends find out about the camping car model contest from Dada. When they learn that this years grand prize is a "camping car," both Scot and Duda jump at the chance to be Pinkars model. However, there can only be one model, and the model must be energetic and healthy. So, Scot and Duda decide to compete for the position. Scot receives rigorous physical training from Piggy and Puggy. On the other hand, Duda takes a more fun and moderate route. Finally, the day of "the most energetic competition" arrives. Duda appears refreshed and excited; however, Scot is nowhere to be seen. The friends find him sleeping, totally exhausted from the fierce training he underwent. It looks like Duda will become Pinkars default model.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Braianna Gets The Boots
programme.desc: Braianna is accused of a crime she didn’t commit, stealing the boots of a legendary soccer star.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: Fairy Dust_Based On Sleeping Beauty
programme.desc: In the tale of Sleeping Beauty, the Prince kisses the Princess, expecting her to finally awaken from her long sleep. But, against all the odds, the Princess sleeps on. SANDRA, assisted by FO, discovers that the Princess’s lips are covered in magic dust. One of the characters in the tale of Sleeping Beauty does not want the princess to ever wake up

programme.title: The Magic Wand
programme.desc: The van of the magician is passing by the GrandPAs house as Hoodie grabs the magicians wand unnoticed and heads towards the house.

programme.title: Hello Pinkar!
programme.desc: Dada, an explorer, and his amazing Pinkar camping car crash in the Unknown Forest. He soon meets Bubbles, the forgetful fish, Caber, the know-it-all beaver, and Doubt, the happy mole. The sudden arrival of Dada and Pinkar ruins the presentation of Scottie Buddys new invention. So Scot, the self-proclaimed "greatest inventor of the Unknown Forest" and Piggy and Puggy, the crazy owl brothers, go to find out what has happened. As soon as Scot sets his eyes on Pinkar, its love at first sight. He decides he should have it for himself. He suggests having a race, Pinkar against Scottie Buddy, and the winner gets a wish. Motivated to win, Scot ends up going too fast, but when he tries to slow down he realizes he forgot to brake his invention. What will happen to Scot and who will win?

programme.title: Basket Bunny
programme.desc: Fred bargains with the girls basketball team to let Brains join the team. In return, he agrees to be team’s bunny mascot, commanding Friday into a pair of super-jumping shoes. His get up proves handy when Brains needs his help capturing a massive space chicken.

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Hi Five
programme.desc: Pancake splits off four copies of himself, which makes trying to catch them five times more difficult! And he’s having trouble counting that high. Always keep trying/resilience to failure.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Dude's Lagoon
programme.desc: When a mermaid seeks his help because a sea monster is destroying her home, Dude has to figure out a way to stop the creature, especially when he learns its Sneevil and Biggs latest contraption.

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: Smighty Claus
programme.desc: Sneevil dresses up like Smighty Claus to ruin Smighty Christmas. Can Melody and the rest of the Super Six stop him before he steals all the presents in Smightyland.

programme.title: Where’s Kala?
programme.desc: When Kala wants to practise her stealth moves, Gummy and Harry volunteer to help her. Soon Kala is scaring them from various hiding places. After a while the duo doesn’t find Kala anymore, they go too paranoid thinking that Kala is plotting an elaborate scaring plan. Gummy and Harry do all sort of crazy things until they find out that Kala actually went away for her audition in the middle of the game.

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: Mi reino por un amor
programme.desc: Para que Cristina madure, su padre decide darle una lección y le corta todos los ingresos.

programme.title: Venganza amarga
programme.desc: Víctor enamora y se casa con la hija de su padrastro para vengarse de él por la muerte de su madre.

programme.title: Venganza amarga
programme.desc: Víctor enamora y se casa con la hija de su padrastro para vengarse de él por la muerte de su madre.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Sabah Al Arabiya
programme.desc: Start the day afresh with Al Arabiya’s morning show, equipping viewers with social and cultural news, a regional press review and sports and weather updates.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Market Pulse
programme.desc: Market Pulse

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 2
programme.desc: Al Aswaq Al Arabiya 2

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

Lights Fantastic 1942
programme.desc: A tour of the bright lights of New York City, where the various advertising signs come to life.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: The Mummy Strikes 1943
programme.desc: While investigating an egyptologist's mysterious death, Superman must battle dangerous mummies.

programme.title: Felix Lends a Hand 1922
programme.desc: Trudging through the snow in his hometown, Felix sees a billboard advertising sunny Egypt, and says that he'd give four of his nine lives to be there rather than freezing in the snow. He then hears crying coming from his friend Abdul's carpet shop, and it turns out that Abdul's girlfriend has been kidnapped by an Egyptian sheik. Felix promises to rescue her, and hops on a magic carpet Abdul has lying around the shop, says the magic word and flies off to Egypt to keep his promise.

programme.title: Birth of a Notion 1947
programme.desc: Daffy Duck cons a dog named Leopold into offering him a stay in his house, but he has to hide Daffy from his master, a Peter-Lorre style mad scientist who needs a duck's wishbone.

programme.title: My Favorite Duck 1942
programme.desc: Porky tries to relax on a hunting and fishing trip, but Daffy, smugly pointing out the "No Duck Hunting" signs, subjects him to constant irritation. Then the "Duck Hunting Season Open" signs start going up.

programme.desc: A Car Tune Portrait -1937

programme.title: Popeye Meets Sinbad the Sailor 1936
programme.desc: The legendary sailors Popeye and Sindbad do battle to see which one is the greatest.

programme.title: Quack a Doodle Doo 1950
programme.desc: His Mama is the only one who love Baby Huey, an overgrown clumsy ugly duckling. The other Mamas and their broods shun him like the plague and make his little life miserable. But when a ferocious fox attacks the barnyard, Huey comes to the rescue of one and all. Huey is a hero basking in his new-found popularity. First of the series.

programme.title: Rookie Revue 1941
programme.desc: The toons do a send up of the military as only the toons can do

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: Spooky Swabs 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive are shipwrecked; they think they are saved when they see a ship, but what they don't realize is that the crew of the Sea Witch is all ghosts, and soon they are under attack, but they don't know from what for a while

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963: Season 3; Episode 21; A Wife for Andy
programme.desc: Barney's ready for Andy to get married, but Andy is not. In the situations that follow, Andy may have found someone, unbeknownst to Mayberry's most meddlesome matchmaker.

programme.desc: The prodigal son of a Yukon prospector comes home on a night that "ain't fit for man nor beast."

programme.title: Kid Auto Races at Venice -1914
programme.desc: The Tramp wanders into and disrupts the filming of a go-kart race.

programme.title: Lonely Wives-1931

programme.title: Cruel Cruel Love-1914
programme.desc: A silly aristocrat who believes that he has been jilted attempts suicide but he is saved from death and reunited with his fiancée.

Instead of purchasing the horse the people he employs steal the animal instead, taking Lame Bear's son as hostage in the process. After the capture of Tonto, the Lone Ranger needs to use all his diplomacy and cunning as a law enforcer to stop out right war between Lame Bear's tribe and the US cavalry

programme.title: Lake Trout - Great Slave Lake
programme.desc: We take in the last morning of fishing before the long 300km boat ride home to Yellowknife, NT. The fish are not done yet and we get to show you what not to do, when battling a giant lake trout to the boat!

programme.desc: Its September and Ryan jumps back into the boat with Captain Andrew Moore and they head out on another personal bucket list adventure for the elusive Inconnu and some giant pike.
